alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 12:44AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Door County through 130 AM CDT... At 1243 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newport State Park, or 28 miles east of Menominee, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Door County, including the following locations... Washington Island, Fish Creek, Peninsula State Park, Sister Bay, Ellison Bay, Rock Island State Park and Rowleys Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
